channel.title: Help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @adamhack adamhack
item.description:
@adamhack wrote:

if the the problem that you have is in the

ReplaceObject

cut them from each one example…

[code] if (objectID == 2117) { //search = open (wall = closed)
if ((objectX == 2875 && objectY == 9799)) {
face = 0; //West
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 2623) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2924 && objectY == 9803)) {
face = -2; //North
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 1558) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9832)) {
face = -1; //North
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 1557) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9831)) {
face = -3; //South
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 1542) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2892 && objectY == 9826)) {
face = 0; //West
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 1544) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2893 && objectY == 9826)) {
face = -2; //East
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 2143) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9831)) {
face = -1; //North
}//else = West (standard)
}
else if (objectID == 2144) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9830)) {
face = -3; //South
}//else = West (standard)
}

if ((objectID == 9293) && (objectX == 2887) && (objectY == 9799)) //pipe1 in tav dungeon
{
sendMessage(“You crawl through the small pipe…”);
sendMessage(“You come out at the blue dragons!.”);
teleportToX = 2892;
teleportToY = 9799;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @darkness2288 darkness2288
item.description:
@darkness2288 wrote:

can some one fix this code is the doors and gates in travely dungen i try to fix it but the things just won’t work can someone smart fix it for me?

[code] if (objectID == 2117) { //search = open (wall = closed)
if ((objectX == 2875 && objectY == 9799)) {
face = 0; //West
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 2623) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2924 && objectY == 9803)) {
face = -2; //North
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 1558) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9832)) {
face = -1; //North
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 1557) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2898 && objectY == 9831)) {
face = -3; //South
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 1542) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2892 && objectY == 9826)) {
face = 0; //West
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 1544) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2893 && objectY == 9826)) {
face = -2; //East
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 2143) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9831)) {
face = -1; //North
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -3);
}
else if (objectID == 2144) { //open = open (gate = closed)
if ((objectX == 2889 && objectY == 9830)) {
face = -3; //South
}//else = West (standard)
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, (objectID + 1), -1);
}

if ((objectID == 9293) && (objectX == 2887) && (objectY == 9799)) //pipe1 in tav dungeon
{
sendMessage(“You crawl through the small pipe…”);
sendMessage(“You come out at the blue dragons!.”);
teleportToX = 2892;
teleportToY = 9799;
}[/code]
